resources.string: - Volume Up/Down is mapped to respective buttons in Mouse/Joystick mode.\n\n- Advanced user can edit /sdcard/dosbox.conf for customization. IMPORTANT: config file will override built-in settings (cycles, frameskip, memory size, etc.).
The emulation part of the software is based on GPL source code of DOSBox 0.74 from DOSBox Team (available at www.dosbox.com).
